title: Things that are scarier than this movie: A List
review:
1. Playing a Carpenter's record backwards
2. Throwing out expired milk
3. Overdue library books
4. Crabgrass
5. Forgetting your customer loyalty card at the checkout
6. Wally Cox
7. Seeing that you're down to 1 refill on your prescription
8. Chipmunks

title: superiour quote from the movie?
review:
" If you don't believe me, don't watch! "

Best advice ever! dont watch...

title: terrible terrible terrible
review: Don't waste your time with this movie. the only thing scary about it was how terrible the actors were. especially the boyfriend. everyone could've died in the movie and it wouldn't have made a difference. total snorefest. I've seen way better low budget movies than this (obviously, this movie has set the bar very very low)
